Prerequisites: ACG 2011 OR ACG 2021 WITH A GRADE OF C OR HIGHER
Course Description: THIS COURSE IS A REVIEW OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES INCLUDING ADVANCED WORK IN THE STUDY OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND REPORTING. ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRESENTATION OF CASH, TEMPORARY INVESTMENTS, RECEIVABLES, PLANT ASSETS, AND INVESTMENTS IN STOCKS AND BONDS WILL ALSO BE INCLUDED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
